sqoop.arg: SELECT ModuleInfoID,SerialNo,LaminateID,LaminateCreatedDT,LaminateOrderNo,LaminatePartNo,BINNo,CktFormBuildPart,CktFormBuildMachine,CktFormBuildDT,GlassBuildPart,GlassBuildDate,LaminationBuildMachine,LaminationBuildDT,ModuleID,ModuleCreatedDT,ModuleOrderNo,IntendedModulePartNo,IntendedModulePartDesc,FramingBuildPart,FramingBuildMachine,FramingBuildDT,JboxBuildPart,JboxBuildDT,FlashtestClassifiedDT,FinalModulePartNo,FinalModulePartDesc,ActualPower,ActualVocMod,ActualFF,PackedDT,InventoryState,JboxBuildMachine,ActualIsc,FlashtestBuildMachine,Komax1,Komax2,Komax3,GlassID,CellType,StringerOperator,CircuitOperator1,CircuitOperator2,TrimChangeReason,PowerChartGenerated,LaminateWoId,ModuleWoId,VisualStateId,RfInvStateId,ElTestDate,ElBuildMachine,ActualVmpMod,ActualImpMod,TrimBuildMachine,TrimBuildDT,CellThickness,PalletID,FlashTestID,PadLock,BtoCtoSerialNo,EvaUseByDT, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SPML_ModuleInfo WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionChain,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,VariableTypeID,NoHeads,NoSamples,NoPositions,EntryOrder,Formula, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionNoteID,ActionID,Note,Comments,NoteDT,LoginID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionNote WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionTypeID,ActionType,Description,ActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetCycleCountID,AssetID,RfDayPeriodID,Count,AssetCountTypeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetCycleCount WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AttributeTypeID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,ImageURI,RfAttributeClassID,IsPassFail,IsRaiseCA,LikelyCauses,Impact,Weighting,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,AttributeTypeCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartID,ParentPartID,SubPartID,BOMItemID,SubPartQuantityTotal,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Lvl,SortOrder,SubPartQuantity,BOMVariantID,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsAllowExceedBOMQty, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CauseActionID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedCauseActionID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CauseAction_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernStatusID,ConcernStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CrnAdapterID,Length,ModifiedDT, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CrnAdapter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DepartmentID,Name,DepartmentGroup,Classification1,PlantID,DepartmentCode,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Department WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT EBATriggerID,RfTriggerTypeID,ContextDictionary,TriggerOwnerID,CreateDT,ProcessedDT,RfWatchProcessStateID,Message,TotalTime,OracleInsertTime,OracleConnectionTime,OracleInsertStatement, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.EBATrigger WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeID,Gauge,GaugeTypeID,DataDeviceID,SerialNo,SupplierID,DatePurchased, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Gauge WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT InventoryUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,IsReintroduced,Quantity, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineCellID,LineID,IsPartNumber,IsWONumber,IsCustomer,IsDescription,IsHeader,IsRows,ConfigLayout,IsClickable,IsStopJob,IsStartJob,IsEditable,IsStartNextJob,IsWORef1,IsWORef2,IsWORef3,IsWorkInstruction, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineInfoID,ModifiedDT,IsOEEInventoryIsolation,IsOEEInventoryReintroduction,IsOEESpoilage,IsOEEDowntime,IsOEEInventoryProduction,NoBottlenecks,BottleneckMachineStageID,IsCountOutputInventory,IsCountInputInventory,IsOEEProductionUnits,LoginID,SessionID,PlantID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfoRecalc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionVariantID,Sequence,LkAGAVID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkAGAV WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LkLineLineGroupID,LineGroupID,LineID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLineLineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMaintProcPersonnelID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PersonnelID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMaintProcPersonnel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageInvPositionId,MachineStageId,Position,PositionNumber, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageInvPosition WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopReasonGroupID,MachineStopReasonGroup,Description,MachineStopReasonGroupCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenancePartUsedID,MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceProcedureResultID,PartID,Cost,DT,LoginID,Quantity,UnitID,InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartUsed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,WorkDone,Comments,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MeasurementSetID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedMSID,ApprovalLoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime_Buffer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCDigitalID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCDigital WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCMachineEventID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RfMachineStopRecordModeID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCMachineEvent WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCSpeedID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Formula,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCSpeed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartClassificationID,PartClassification,RfPartClassificationID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PLCID,PLC,Description, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PLC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductionStopReasonID,ProductionStopReason,Description,StopCode,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,RfStopRelativeToJobID,IsPlanned,IsDefaultNoJobReason,IsRetired, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapID,ScrapReasonID,PartID,Quantity,UnitID,DT,MachineStageID,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Scrap WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantDefaultsID,StartOfDay,StartOfWeek,StartOfYear,RfLocaleID,RfDefaultCurrencyID,DataEntryDefaultURI,OnDataCommitGoTo,ChainToStopped,ColourStagesForCurrentJob,UnAckAlarmsPeriod,ShowOverdueIcon,ShowAlarmIcon,WONumberModeID,IsShowVarClassCombo,IsShowAcqClassCombo,RfMachineStopRecordModeID,IsAutoCreateProductsForParts,IsAutoCreateProductTypeForPart,EnforceClosedAlarms,ColourOrder,IsAutoReleaseJob,JobClose,IsAllowDuplicateWONumbers,WoClose,IsOverdueRefToJob,DefaultSPCCalcStyleID,IsAllowInventoryInserts, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantDefaults WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,SPCCalcStyle,CmThreshold,CpThreshold,PpThreshold,CgThreshold,RnRThreshold,IsShowCpOnlyIfStable,CAMTarget,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCCalcStyle_CUS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartSet,AcquisitionID,SPCURI,RfDataBandID,NPeriods,SpecTypeID,IsRunningProductOnly,LHSessionID,MaxTrendRecallWindow, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SupplierID,Supplier,SupplierCode,AddressID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Supplier WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListID,ListName,VariantNo, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagList WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagProfileID,Name, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTypeID,RfDataTypeID,Name,TagTypeCode,ISSYSTEM,TAGVIEW, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,PartID,FromDT,ToDT,Downtime,Total_Time,Uptime, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Jobs_In_Shifts WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolAtLocationID,LocationID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,EditedToolAtLocationID,MovedByLoginID,ModifiedDT,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolAtLocation WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolGroup,Description,ToolGroupCode, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,StartUsingComments,ToolChangeComments,StartLoginID,ChangeLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedChangeDT,SavedStartDT,SavedChangeDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedToolUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableID,VariableTypeID,ProductID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Variable WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VarMeasurementID,SpecID,MeasurementSetID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurement WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT WorkInstructionStepID,WorkInstructionStep,WorkInstructionProcedureID,OperationTypeID,StepOrder,RfSpecialActionTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStage.MachineStageID, MachineStage.MachineStageTypeID, MachineStage.Name, MachineStage.IsRetired, MachineStage.DepartmentID, MachineStage.Description, MachineStage.CurrentShiftPatternID, MachineStage.NoHeads, MachineStage.IsOEEBottleNeck, MachineStage.IsProductionOutput, MachineStage.MachineStopID, MachineStage.StoppedScreenThreshold, MachineStage.LineSectionID, MachineStage.IsDiscrete, MachineStage.RfDowntimeCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfSpoilageCollectionModeID, MachineStage.RfProductionCollectionModeID, MachineStage.LastBuildRecordID, MachineStage.CurrentJobID, MachineStage_Custom.ModuleDatabase, MachineStage_Custom.IntendedWOID, MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM MachineStage FULL JOIN MachineStage_Custom ON (MachineStage.MachineStageID = MachineStage_Custom.MachineStageID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
